title: Goblin Raiding Party
mainText: {kw:Effect} — After your draw step, add one counter to this event and choose one:{n}- tap a building in your town;{n}- discard the highest value resource card from your hand, if you have any;{n}- pay {r:booze=1}.{n}{n}{kw:Resolve}{r:vp=1} — trash this card.
flavourText: Why do the green rapscallions keep stealing my damn Cider?! -Karina, The Bewitching Witch.
